metadata.description: This will be used in intent recognition during Topic match testing.
Specify your Power Automate environment region/cloud: Commercial, GCC, GCC High, or DoD.

parameters.$filter:
_cat_copilottestrunid_value eq '@{triggerOutputs()?['body/InputParameters/CopilotTestRunId']}'  
and statecode eq 0 
and cat_resultcode ne 2 and cat_resultcode ne 3 and cat_resultcode ne 4
and (cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 2 or cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 5) 
and _cat_parent_value eq null

parameters.item/cat_resultreason: @coalesce(body('Run_a_Child_Flow:_Multi_Topic_Enrichment')?['testresultreason'], 'Topic details are not present within Conversation Trasscript')

parameters.$filter:
_cat_copilottestrunid_value eq '@{triggerOutputs()?['body/InputParameters/CopilotTestRunId']}'  
and statecode eq 0 
and cat_resultcode ne 4 
and cat_CopilotTestId/cat_testtypecode eq 2
and _cat_parent_value eq '@{items('Apply_to_each_Result')?['cat_copilottestresultid']}'

inputs.name: MultiturnPendingResult
ContinueMultiturnProcessing

parameters.item/cat_resultreason: @coalesce(body('Run_a_Child_Flow:_Multi_Topic_Enrichment_Multiturn')?['testresultreason'], 'Topic details are not present within Conversation Trasscript')

parameters.item/cat_errordetails:
@concat( outputs('Update_Copilot_Test_Run:_Running')?['body/cat_errordetails'], '
', '', workflow()?['tags']?['flowDisplayName'], ' flow run: Click here to open the flow run' )

@concat( body('Update_Copilot_Test_Run:_Running')?['cat_errordetails'], '
', 'Failed ', workflow()?['tags']?['flowDisplayName'], ' flow run: Click here to open the flow run' )

interval.count: @if(equals(parameters('Delay for Conversation Transcripts Enrichment (Minutes) (cat_DelayforConversationTranscriptsEnrichment)'), null), 60, parameters('Delay for Conversation Transcripts Enrichment (Minutes) (cat_DelayforConversationTranscriptsEnrichment)'))
